item.title: Version 0.2.4
item.description:
v0.2.4 - Canary-Qwen STT option + tokenizer validation fix
New in this release: - Removed Qwen TTS preview path from Provider settings - Added one-click STT source option for NVIDIA Canary-Qwen-2.5B (experimental) - Fixed tokenizer false-fail for valid Parakeet vocab sizes - Kept one-click UX and setup messaging improvements

item.title: Version 0.2.3
item.description:
v0.2.3 - Parakeet download reliability and calmer setup UX
New in this release: - Fixed Parakeet TDT v3 source URLs to avoid HTTP 404 - Added auto fallback to mirror source on 404 and manual "Try mirror" action - Reduced red/error overuse in setup UI; red now reserved for true failures - One-click setup flows remain unchanged and verified

item.title: Version 0.2.2
item.description:
v0.2.2 - Parakeet source alignment + Qwen TTS preview option
New in this release: - Balanced Parakeet mapping aligned to TDT v3 ONNX source path - Removed stale recommended messaging in provider UX - Added one-click Qwen3-TTS option in Text-to-Speech (Preview) - Kept STT flow stable with passing smoke/typecheck gates

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description:
v0.2.1 - Parakeet hardening + release safety polish
New in this release: - Added explicit Parakeet labeling as experimental and not recommended across UI/provider/source labels - Hardened QA scripts and smoke coverage to prevent regressions in local setup flows - Added swift_test_check.sh to safely handle repos without a SwiftPM test target - Improved prerequisite guidance and one-click recovery messaging for managed runtimes

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
v0.2.0 - Smart Whisper model-selection overhaul
New in this release: - Added Smart presets (Light/Balanced/Best/Cloud) with clearer setup flows - Fixed provider fallback resolution so unavailable Parakeet degrades correctly - Added Whisper tiny_en tier for lightweight local use - Stabilized keyboard UI test across simulator keyboard-control variance
